snippet: In the past half-decade, local fans lining the race route on Bastille Day have had little to cheer about except the day off from work: the last French Tour winner was in 2005.
abstract: In the past half-decade, local fans lining the race route on Bastille Day have had little to cheer about except the day off from work: the last French Tour winner was in 2005.

headline.main: Putting the France Back Into the Tour
